text.title: Plockton
text.head: Plockton
text.p:
Plockton
is a village on the coast of
Wester Ross
in the
Scottish Highlands
, sheltered from the west winds and popular with yacht and dingy sailors . Plockton along with Kyle of Lochalsh was the setting for the " Hamish MacBeth " TV series , aired 1995-97 .
text.head: Get in
text.p:
By train :
four trains run M-Sat between
Inverness
and
Kyle of Lochalsh
, one on Sunday , stopping at Dingwall , Achnasheen , Stromeferry and Plockton . Buses to Skye connect with these trains at Kyle .

By road
Plockton is about 7 miles north of Kyle of Lochalsh , take A890 then branch west down the coast lane . Macrae Kintail Bus 712 runs just once in the morning M - F from Corran via Glenelg , Dornie and Kyle of Lochalsh to Plockton . It immediately turns round for the return , so it 's no help for day trips . The long-distance coaches to Kyle and Skye do n't come via Plockton .
text.head: Get around
text.p: The village is small and pleasant to walk around .
text.head: See

list.item:
Plockton Harbour :
The mild climate due to the North Atlantic Drift allows palm and cabbage trees to prosper . You 'll probably see seals .

Attadale Gardens
are 10 miles east on A890 along Loch Carron . 20 acres of woodland , fern and Himalayan species , dotted with sculptures . They 're open April-Oct daily 10:00 - 17:00 , adult £8 .

text.head: Do

list.item: There is plenty of opportunity for hill-walking locally .

Calums Seal Trips
, Harbour Street , ☏ +441599544306 . Wildlife watching trips ( weather permitting ) sail daily Easter to Oct , usually at 10:30 , 12:00 , 14:00 and 16:00 . The boat
Sula Mhor
takes 61 , with 35 places bookable . Depending on tides it may sail from the car park pontoon or the main pier . Adult £12 .

Lochcarron Highland Games
are held in late July at Attadale Estate , along A890 . The next event is on Sat 18 July 2020 .

text.head: Eat

list.item:
Shores Restaurant
, 30 Harbour St , Plockton , ☏ +441599544263 . Coffee shop open year round daily , light lunches Tu-Sat . Restaurant Apr-Oct Tu - Su 11:30 - 14:30 & 17:00 - 21:00 .

The Harbour Fish Bar
, Innes Street , Plockton , ☏ +441599544479 . Daily 12:30 - 14:30 & 17:30 - 20:00 . Traditional fish & chips , chicken , Stornoway black pudding , etc. Seating outside .

text.head: Drink

list.item:
The Plockton Inn
also has rooms .

text.head: Sleep

list.item: There are several B&Bs ( doubles from £90 ) and self-catering cottages .
Station Bunkhouse has two six-bed and two four-bed dorms . From £18 ppn ; sole use £260 .

The Plockton Hotel
, 41 Harbour St , ☏ +441599544274 . Cosy two-star with public bar and restaurant . B&B double £130 .

Duncraig Castle
( A mile east of village ) . Hotel in 19th C mansion
closed
for renovation until spring 2020 .

text.head: Go next
text.p:
From
Kyle of Lochalsh
cross to
Skye
on the toll-free bridge .
